DOC.brief_title: Biological Specimen Collection Laboratory Methods Development Training Purposes
DOC.detailed_description: We propose two related activity involve collection biological sample . The first involve collection mouthwash sample 200 volunteer , assess feasibility pool sample quantitative genotype determination . For small number volunteer , also collect peripheral blood sample skin punch biopsy establishment lymphoblastoid fibroblast cell line . The blood skin sample use compare amount subcellular localization DNA repair protein lymphocytes ( cell commonly collect epidemiologic study ) fibroblast ( cell type commonly use assay development ) . In addition , conduct hands-on education training session molecular genetics member DCEG others . The hands-on education session aim non-laboratory scientist involve 6-9 hour demonstration participation basic molecular genetics technique . Participants option collect mouthwash sample , extract DNA , perform genotyping assay sample Laboratory Population Genetics Building 41 . After education session , biological sample reassign arbitrary number link personally identify information use laboratory method development .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : All individual age 21 old eligible .
